name: Lost In Space (itch) (ilhamnurilmi)
description:
lost in space is a short platformer genre game where the story of the player is lost in space after a rocket flight in 2077, then he tries to return to earth by passing obstacles on the planet.

I really hope you will enjoy this short game and would love to hear any kind of feedback!

Controls:

A or Arrow key (<--) =  Move Left

D or Arrow key (-->) = Move right

Mouse Left Click = Shoot

Space = Jump
